New Records: Axar Patel needed one wicket to become the ninth India bowler to 50 in T20Is
Mohammad Nabi is 67 runs away from becoming the second Afghanistan batter to score 2000 in T20Is
Key Match Events: Match tied (India won the 2nd Super Over)
Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan's lack of batting firepower has often stopped them from turning their bowlers' good work into wins against top teams
Axar Patel has had a terrific series with the ball, and Washington Sundar a tidy one
Post-Match Reflections: Afghanistan coach Jonathan Trott on his expectations from the final T20I
Miscellaneous Highlights: The M Chinnaswamy Stadium is renowned for its run-fests
Conditions in the West Indies - and possibly the USA - may allow India to use this combination during the T20 World Cup
Others: The forecast promises a clear, pleasant evening with temperatures in the mid-20s Celsius
